definition: to hasten/to hurry/to walk fast/to approach/to tend towards/to converge
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)
(increasing) day by day/(more critical) with every passing day/gradually
to rush like ducks (idiom); the mob scrabbles madly for sth unobtainable/an unruly crowd on a wild goose chase
to blindly follow suit (idiom)/to imitate slavishly/to do what everyone else is doing
to curry favor (idiom); playing up to those in power/social climbing
to seek luck and avoid calamity (idiom)
to fawn on/to kiss up to
see 亦步亦趨|亦步亦趋[yi4 bu4 yi4 qu1]

sentences.english: Bacterial chemotaxis optimization is a novel category of bionic algorithm for optimization problems.
sentences.chinese: 细菌趋药性算法是优化领域一种新的仿生进化算法。

sentences.english: Transportation costs would be next to nil.
sentences.chinese: 运输费用也将趋近于零。

sentences.english: This would have been a very interesting story.
sentences.chinese: 这看似是一个非常有趋的发现。

sentences.english: Some cells also exhibit chemotaxis the ability to move toward or away from the source of a diffusing chemical.
sentences.chinese: 某些细胞具备趋药性，即趋向或逃离扩散开的化学源。

sentences.english: This is the first and only textbook and sourcebook on chemotaxis.
sentences.chinese: 这是第一个也是唯一的教科书和趋原始资料。

sentences.english: Group buying is an outgrowth of a popular trend here– discount shopping.
sentences.chinese: 团购是非常流行趋的打折商店的副产品。

sentences.english: Then one of the judges of the city stood forth and said, "Speak to us of Crime and Punishment."
sentences.chinese: 城中的一位法官趋前言道，请给我们讲讲罪与罚。

sentences.english: It's concluded that O. hupensis has different phototaxis with different light intensities and colors.
sentences.chinese: 结论钉螺对光强和光色具有不同的趋性反应。

sentences.english: No obvious resistance against EBT and acetophenate has been found with sensitive level.
sentences.chinese: EBT和三氯杀虫酯抗性不明显，趋敏感水平。

definition: to approach (a numerical value)/to converge to a limit (in calculus)/convergence
to become more and more/to gradually become
to slow down/to ease up/to abate/slowdown/downturn
progress step by step/gradual progress/to move forward (slowly)
classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
